study_id.Description: Unique identifier for the study dataset containing this derivative

derivative_id.Description: Identifier for the derivative directory (e.g., fMRIPrep-24.1.1)

datalad_uuid.Description: DataLad dataset UUID for disambiguation, or 'n/a'

url.Description: Git URL of the derivative dataset

size_total.Description: Total size of the derivative dataset in bytes

size_annexed.Description: Size of annexed (large) files in bytes

file_count.Description: Number of files in the derivative dataset

outdatedness.Description: Number of commits the processed raw version is behind current raw version

processed_raw_version.Description: Version/commit of the raw dataset that was processed
